lark.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small brown singing bird with long pointed wings
lark.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: something that you do to amuse yourself or as a joke
lark.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I only went along for a lark.
lark.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: used to describe an activity that you think is silly or difficult
lark.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Salad again? How long are you going to keep up this healthy eating lark?
